name: Super Parigo Kart
overview: It is a complete hack of Super Mario Kart: New characters, New tracks, New backgrounds, New graphics, AI in GP working, Items and coins placement done, etc … Note: This is a PAL hack only! The main purpose of this hack was to provide some sort of SMK 2 (same type of tracks, same type of shortcuts, same type of fun, etc…) but with personal features, as the author is a member of the Super Mario Kart community and wanted to add some “private jokes” in it for other members … That’s why some of the backgrounds or characters will appear strange for some people. The game is a follow-up of SMK and can be enjoyed as much as the original.
